snippet: In Congo, rebels loyal to Bosco Ntaganda are said to have fled into Rwanda or surrendered to United Nations peacekeepers after being routed by a rival faction.
lead_paragraph: In Congo, rebels loyal to Bosco Ntaganda are said to have fled into Rwanda or surrendered to United Nations peacekeepers after being routed by a rival faction.

headline.seo: Congolese Rebels Loyal to Warlord Flee or Surrender
headline.main: Rebels in Congo Loyal to Warlord Flee or Give Up
headline.print_headline: Rebels in Congo Loyal to Warlord Flee or Give Up
